Text: The Picture of Dorian Gray (German: Das Bildnis des Dorian Gray) is a 1917 German silent fantasy film directed by Richard Oswald and starring Bernd Aldor, Ernst Pittschau, and Ernst Ludwig.

Text: The Picture of Dorian Gray (1917 film):  The film is based on the novel "The Picture of Dorian Gray" by Oscar Wilde.
